title: Notable & Quotable: Denver Mayor Michael B. Hancock
sub_head: ‘I fully acknowledge that I have urged everyone to stay home and avoid unnecessary travel.’
body: I fully acknowledge that I have urged everyone to stay home and avoid unnecessary travel. . . . What I did not share, but should have, is that my wife and my daughter have been in Mississippi, where my daughter recently took a job. As the holiday approached, I decided it would be safer for me to travel to see them than to have two family...
